about_the_game:
Snuff-TV is an entertainment reality show competition in which participants will have to compete in a challenge to death in order to be acclaimed by the crowd and get the title of champion. The winner will also be guaranteed total freedom, the annulment of criminal records and ascension in the social hierarchy, which will allow him to make a new and better life.

So what are you waiting for? Do you think you got what it takes to be the best? Prove it! Send us your request to participate, pass the qualification round and become the most badass gladiator in the history of Snuff-TV!

even inconvenient figures was sent to the armored and prisons city.
